TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed VerificationReportLevel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies reporting levels for an accessibility rule defined by an instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When using extending a class, member or indexer with a <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>, you must define the level of reporting that the verification rule represents by specifying one of the VerificationReportLevel values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel Error = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The verification rule represented by the instance is an error.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel Guideline = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The verification rule represented by the instance is a guideline.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel Warning = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The verification rule represented by the instance is a warning.
